setName(String) - Method in class Character
 
setName() - Method in class Dagger
 
setName() - Method in class Equipment
Sets the name of the Equipment based on its stats NAMES: (names of weapons - randomized) sword -- sword - broadsword - katana - scimitar - rapier - cutlass - saber staff -- staff - wand - tome - sceptor dagger -- dagger - knife - stiletto - dirk - shank (material of equips - based on stats (def usually) ) WEAPONS -- wooden - copper - iron - bronze - steel - silver - gold - cobalt - mythril - adamantium ARMOR -- cloth - leather - rubber - copper - iron - bronze - steel - silver - gold - cobalt - mythril - adamantium -- (can sometimes be light/heavy) RING/PENDANT -- cloth - leather - rubber - stone - copper - iron - bronze - steel - silver - gold - cobalt - mythril - adamantium - rainbow RING -- (based on what stat: ) - frenzied - magical - strong - enchanted - hasty - transparent - trueSeeing - healing - skillful -- (statBonus based name: negative/positive ) - corrupted - blessed (names of armors - randomized)
